name: Welcome to The Void.
description:
Welcome to The Void

A text-based comedy game taking place in The Void. It's exactly what it sounds like, or maybe not. 

Explore an unique world containing several wacky characters! And by world I mean like 3 locations. And by several I mean about 2. And by wacky I mean maybe mildly interesting. And by-

 Contains 10 different endings, including 1 'true' ending. Can you get them all? You probably can, it's not that hard. Or maybe it is. I'm not great at marketing.

-----

TW: Contains text-based descriptions of blood, bodily harm, and stage fright.

-----

This is a remake of a game I made back in high school. It was originally made for fun in a game coding club, but I chose to remake it for one of our class's Twine projects. It only needed to be 5 pages long, but this ended up being over 50 in total. Hope you enjoy!
